title: It works for the IRS
author: VD
content_html: The efforts of some colleges to shut down these classic demonstrations of free speech have failed miserably. For example, at William and Mary College, administrators recently claimed that students conducting such a sale were “violating campus policy.” However, when later asked by the student protestors to cite the specific policies, the administration claimed that, “Referring to the Student Handbook at this point in time is counterproductive.”
content_text:
The efforts of some colleges
to shut down these classic demonstrations of free speech have failed miserably. For example, at William and Mary College, administrators recently claimed that students conducting such a sale were “violating campus policy.” However, when later asked by the student protestors to cite the specific policies, the administration claimed that, “Referring to the Student Handbook at this point in time is counterproductive.”
